类 com.yuep.core.client.component.wizard.BasicWizardController
的使用

使用 BasicWizardController 的软件包
com.yuep.core.client.component.wizard   
 

com.yuep.core.client.component.wizard 中 BasicWizardController 的使用
 

返回 BasicWizardController 的 com.yuep.core.client.component.wizard 中的方法
 BasicWizardController<T,BasicWizardView<T>,BasicWizardModel<T>> ContainerWizardController.getCurrentController()
          返回当前正在操作步骤界面的Controller
 BasicWizardController<T,BasicWizardView<T>,BasicWizardModel<T>> ContainerWizardView.getCurrentController()
          返回返回当前正在操作步骤界面的Controller
protected abstract  BasicWizardController ContainerWizardController.getFirstBasicController()
          返回第一步的Controller，必须Override该方法，否则界面无法初始化
protected abstract  BasicWizardController BasicWizardController.getNextBasicWizardController()
          获取当前步骤下一步的Controller
protected abstract  BasicWizardController BasicWizardController.getPreviousBasicWizardController()
          获取当前步骤前一步的Controller
 

参数类型为 BasicWizardController 的 com.yuep.core.client.component.wizard 中的方法
 void ContainerWizardView.setCurrentController(BasicWizardController controller, java.lang.Object newValue)
          设置当前操作步骤界面的Controller
